skill.name: alphafold-database
skill.description: Access AlphaFold's 200M+ AI-predicted protein structures. Retrieve structures by UniProt ID, download PDB/mmCIF files, analyze confidence metrics (pLDDT, PAE), for drug discovery and structural biology.
skill.summary: Access AlphaFold's 200M+ AI-predicted protein structures. Retrieve structures by UniProt ID, downloa...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: The skill is documentation-only and focuses on public AlphaFold and related APIs. It includes examples that perform network requests and invoke command line tools. No hidden data collection or credential access is present.

content.user_title: Access AlphaFold structures and confidence data
content.value_statement: Finding reliable protein structures and confidence scores across sources is slow. This skill provides direct AlphaFold queries, downloads, and confidence guidance in one workflow.
actual_capabilities: Query AlphaFold prediction metadata by UniProt accession
Download mmCIF or PDB coordinate files by AlphaFold ID
Retrieve confidence and PAE JSON files for analysis
Use UniProt search endpoints to resolve accessions
Access bulk datasets through Google Cloud Storage and BigQuery
limitations: Requires internet access to AlphaFold and Google Cloud endpoints
Large bulk downloads can be slow and bandwidth intensive
Predictions are single chain and may miss ligands or cofactors
Valid UniProt accessions are required for lookups

use_cases.title: Check model confidence
use_cases.description: Retrieve pLDDT and PAE to judge which regions are reliable for analysis.

use_cases.title: Download target models
use_cases.description: Fetch AlphaFold structures in mmCIF or PDB for docking and pocket review.

use_cases.title: Scale to proteomes
use_cases.description: Use GCS and BigQuery to gather many predictions for large scale studies.

prompt_templates.title: Find AlphaFold ID
prompt_templates.scenario: I have a UniProt ID and need the entry ID
prompt_templates.prompt: Get AlphaFold prediction metadata for UniProt P00520 and list the entryId and file URLs.

prompt_templates.title: Download structure files
prompt_templates.scenario: I need mmCIF and confidence files
prompt_templates.prompt: Show how to download the mmCIF and confidence JSON for AF-P00520-F1 and save them locally.

prompt_templates.title: Interpret confidence
prompt_templates.scenario: I want guidance on pLDDT and PAE
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain how to interpret pLDDT and PAE for AF-P00520-F1 and flag likely low confidence regions.

prompt_templates.title: Bulk dataset query
prompt_templates.scenario: I need a BigQuery filter for humans
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a BigQuery query to list human proteins with fractionPlddtVeryHigh above 0.8.

output: Most residues show high pLDDT, indicating a reliable core structure
Low confidence segments appear at flexible termini
PAE suggests stable domain positions with a few uncertain interfaces

best_practices: Cache downloaded files locally to reduce repeated API calls
Review pLDDT and PAE before drawing structural conclusions
Use GCS or BigQuery for large scale downloads
anti_patterns: Assuming all predicted regions are reliable without pLDDT review
Downloading full proteomes over REST instead of GCS
Ignoring AlphaFold version suffixes in file URLs

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code
faq.answer: Yes, the instructions and API patterns work across Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: What are the main limits of AlphaFold predictions
faq.answer: Models are single chain, may miss ligands, and low confidence regions should be treated as uncertain.

faq.question: How does it integrate with existing pipelines
faq.answer: It uses REST endpoints, BioPython parsing, and BigQuery queries common in bioinformatics pipelines.

faq.question: Does it access or store private data
faq.answer: No, it only uses public AlphaFold and Google Cloud datasets and does not request local credentials.

faq.question: What if the API returns 404 or 429
faq.answer: Verify the UniProt ID, then retry with backoff or use bulk datasets for large jobs.

faq.question: How does this compare to website downloads
faq.answer: It enables automated retrieval, confidence analysis, and bulk access not available in the web UI.
